校.definition: (bound form) school; college; (bound form) (military) field officer

校地.definition: (Tw) the land on which a school is built (or is intended to be built)

校官.definition: military officer; ranked officer in Chinese army, divided into 大校, 上校, 中校, 少校

校徽.definition: school badge; college insignia; university crest

校慶.definition: anniversary of the founding of a school

校招.definition: campus recruiting (abbr. for 校園招聘|校园招聘[xiao4 yuan2 zhao1 pin4])

校方.definition: the school (as a party in a contract, dispute etc); the school authorities

校正.definition: to proofread and correct; to edit and rectify; to correct; to calibrate

校花.definition: the prettiest girl in the school (see also 校草[xiao4 cao3]); school beauty queen; campus belle; prom queen

校草.definition: the most handsome boy in the school (see also 校花[xiao4 hua1])

校釋.definition: to collate and annotate; (on book titles) collated and annotated

校長.definition: (college, university) president; headmaster; CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2]

校閱.definition: to check through (a document); to proofread; to review (troops)

校風.definition: the tone of a school; campus atmosphere

校鬧.definition: disruptive activities targeted at a school by an aggrieved party (neologism formed by analogy with 醫鬧|医闹[yi1nao4])
